mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prodType, prodUseFlag, prodName, prodScore, prodRegDate, prodModDate, feedSalaryAge, feedType, funcTeethFlag, funcTearsFlag, funcBrainFlag, funcImmunityFlag, funcBoneFlag, funcStressFlag, funcKidneyFlag, funcHeartFlag, funcAllergyFlag, funcPregnancyFlag, funcIntestineFlag, funcNeuteringFlag, funcWeightFlag, funcSkinFlag, feedEtc, feedBrand, feedIngredient, feedSize, feedDelFlag ) VALUE ( #{prodType}, #{prodUseFlag}, #{prodName}, 0, #{prodRegDate}, #{prodModDate}, #{feedSalaryAge}, #{feedType}, #{funcTeethFlag}, #{funcTearsFlag}, #{funcBrainFlag}, #{funcImmunityFlag}, #{funcBoneFlag}, #{funcStressFlag}, #{funcKidneyFlag}, #{funcHeartFlag}, #{funcAllergyFlag}, #{funcPregnancyFlag}, #{funcIntestineFlag}, #{funcNeuteringFlag}, #{funcWeightFlag}, #{funcSkinFlag}, #{feedEtc}, #{feedBrand}, #{feedIngredient}, #{feedSize}, 0 )
